DOC.brief_summary: 1 . In chest pain patient suspect acute coronary syndrome , 2-hr delta Troponin-I measure i-STAT immunoassay reliably identifies exclude acute myocardial infarction . 2 . In chest pain patient suspect acute coronary syndrome whose baseline troponin 99th percentile less 0.2ng/ml , 2hr delta Troponin-I measure i-STAT immunoassay accurately discriminate acute myocardial infarction non-acute myocardial infarction troponin elevation .
DOC.brief_title: Usefulness 2-hour Delta Troponin-I During ED Identification Exclusion Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Aims : 1 ) Demonstrate 2hr delta troponin measure i-STAT platform reliably identify exclude MI initial ED evaluation . 2 ) Demonstrate 2hr delta troponin useful discrimination AMI versus non-AMI condition patient low abnormal baseline Troponin-I value . Secondary Aims : 1 ) Demonstrate positive 2-hr delta troponin-I identifies patient high risk 30 day ACE . 2 ) Other Secondary aim TBD .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult patient 18 year age old 2 . Chest pain suspicious ACS 3 . Absence STsegment elevation AMI ( STEMI ) STEMI equivalent initial ECG 4 . Baseline iSTAT troponin less equal 1.0 ng/ml 5 . Enrollment initiate 2 hour 'delt ' troponin value available review 6 . Ability willingness participate cooperate telephone followup evaluation 1 . STelevation ECG criterion result diagnosis AMI result patient send percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) treat thrombolytic 2 . Patients chest pain deem warrant cardiac screen 3 . Blunt chest trauma 4 . Tachyarrhythmia ( ventricular tachycardia , supraventricular tachycardia , rapid atrial fibrillation ) 5 . Cardiac Arrest prior arrival 6 . Hemodynamically unstable patient 7 . Pulmonary edema require CPAP , BIPAP , mechanical ventilation 8 . Baseline iSTAT troponin measurement great 1.0 ng/ml 9 . Baseline 2hour iSTAT Troponin measurement obtain 10 . Patient ( Legal Representative ) unable unwilling provide write informed consent 11 . Subject unwilling unlikely comply study procedure , include protocolspecific blood sample 12 . Subject unwilling , unable , deem unlikely respond participate telephone followup 13 . Vulnerable population deem inappropriate study
